page.title: 12HOME LIFE
page.content: I am 13 years old,the eldest of two sons.My parents are teachers.I get up at 7:00am and get dressed.I do my piano practice until 8:00am when I have breakfast(bacon,egg,fried bread & Cornflakes)which has been prepared by Mum.I feed my pet guinea-pig and bunny at 8:30am.Then my friends arrive and I go off to school,on foot.I arrive at school at 8:45am ready for assembly at 8:50am.Between 8:50am and 3:50pm we have 5 1-hour long lessons,a break,a lunch-hour and 2 registrations.For lunch I have chips and a'Coke'which costs 40p.I walk home after school and at 6:00pm I have tea which is usually a cooked meal.Afterwards I do several different things,such as school home- work,play cricket,football or tennis or go to Youth Club.At 9:00pm,if I've finished my homework,I wash and go to bed.
